panels.description: Conntrack flows per fixed IP address for selected instances and projects (only IPs with > 1000 flows shown).

targets.legendFormat: IP {{ ip }} | Instance {{ instance_uuid }} | Project: {{ project_uuid }}

panels.title: Conntrack Flows per IP (Hot Only)

panels.description: Total conntrack flows per instance (sum of all fixed IPs, only instances with > 3000 flows shown).
panels.title: Conntrack Flows per Instance (Hot Only)

panels.description: Threat-intel contact density per instance (Tor, Spamhaus, EmergingThreats, Custom list). Values represent approximate hits per 5-minute window.

targets.legendFormat: Custom List | Instance {{ instance_uuid }} | Project: {{ project_uuid }}

panels.title: Threat-Intel Contacts Timeline (Tor / Spamhaus / ET / Custom)

panels.description: Top 100 IPs by current conntrack flow count over time for the selected hypervisors/projects/instances.

targets.legendFormat: IP {{ ip }} | Instance {{ instance_uuid }} | Project: {{ project_uuid }}

panels.title: Conntrack Top IPs (Time Series)

panels.description: Threat-intel hit summary over the current time range (total combined hits per instance, only instances with > 3 hits shown).
panels.title: Threat-Intel Hit Summary (Total per Instance)

panels.description: Display CPU usage above 75% for more than 5 consecutive minutes.
panels.title: Instance CPU Usage

panels.description: Display disk read/write request IOPS above tier threshold. Thresholds are dynamic per tier. If it is on here, it is over its threshold.

targets.legendFormat: W | Instance {{ instance_uuid }} | Disk Type: {{ disk_type }} | Disk: {{ disk_uuid }} | Project: {{ project_uuid }}
R | Instance {{ instance_uuid }} | Disk Type: {{ disk_type }} | Disk: {{ disk_uuid }} | Project: {{ project_uuid }}

panels.title: Disk Read/Write Requests (IOPS)

panels.description: Display disk read/write throughput above 50MB/s for more than 5 consecutive minutes.

targets.legendFormat: W | Instance {{ instance_uuid }} | Disk Type: {{ disk_type }} | Disk: {{ disk_uuid }} | Project: {{ project_uuid }}
R | Instance {{ instance_uuid }} | Disk Type: {{ disk_type }} | Disk: {{ disk_uuid }} | Project: {{ project_uuid }}

panels.title: Disk Read/Write Throughput

panels.description: Display disk read/write high usage if greater than 20GB in a 30 minute span. Not cumulative; only shows periods where usage was high.

targets.legendFormat: W | Instance {{ instance_uuid }} | Disk Type: {{ disk_type }} | Disk: {{ disk_uuid }} | Project: {{ project_uuid }}
R | Instance {{ instance_uuid }} | Disk Type: {{ disk_type }} | Disk: {{ disk_uuid }} | Project: {{ project_uuid }}

panels.title: Disk Read/Write High Usage (GB in 30m)

panels.description: Display network RX/TX usage in gigabytes if greater than 20GB in a 30 minute consecutive period.
panels.title: Network RX/TX Usage (GB in 30m)

panels.description: Display network RX/TX throughput if greater than 125Mbit/s and transfer total is greater than 20 gigabytes in 30 consecutive minutes.
panels.title: Network RX/TX Throughput

panels.description: Display network RX/TX packets per second above 10000/pps if consecutive for more than 1 minute.
panels.title: Network RX/TX Packets PPS

panels.description: Display network RX/TX dropped packets if greater than 0.
panels.title: Network RX/TX Dropped Packets

panels.description: Display network RX/TX packet errors if greater than 0.
panels.title: Network RX/TX Packet Errors
